name: Credit report 2015-2016
notes: First year of contribution credits program meant many credits weren't marked at all (and are assumed mixed).

name: Credit report 2016-2017
notes: Approximately 28% of commits don't have credit data, so may be counted as mixed.

notes: Approx 25% of credits are unmarked, and may be counted as mixed.
